name: Smartrek
description: s an ambitious project to solve urban traffic congestion problems. My primary responsibility in the team is to build an Android app for user guidance and data collection.

name: Purpose-built Appliance
description: s an ambitious project to solve urban traffic congestion problems. My primary responsibility in the team is to build an Android app for user guidance and data collection.

name: ChemBook
description: is an one-stop-shop for writing chemistry lab reports.

name: Radioactivity
description: The project radioactivity had started in March of 2011 in an attempt to help the general public to be alerted regarding the spread of radiation and other radioactive materials originated from the catastrophic incident in the Fukushima nuclear power plant in Japan, by providing visual information of city-wise radition levels.

name: Kindleholic
description: is an RSS/Atom feed aggregation service for Amazon Kindle.

name: Teach Ourselves
description: is a project to create a society for students in which learning and creativity is rewarded with points that can be redeemed for goods.

name: Bootstrapped Learning
description: is a DARPA sponsored project to develop an electronic student that can learn from natural human instruction close to the way humans do.

name: gdocsdb
description: is a Python library to use Google Spreadsheet as a database.

name: maps
description: is a project to reconstruct a map in global scale by collecting map tiles from various sources such as Google Maps and Open Street Map.

name: Violet
description: is a children's book for iPad with user-interactable animations.

name: Readown
description: is a Markdown reader for Mac OS X.

name: CQube
description: is a labyrinth-like puzzle game for iPhone.

name: Mandelbrot set
description: is a distributed processing project to draw a mandelbrot set using multiple computers.
